citeinfo.title: Changes in Anthropogenic Influences on Streams and Rivers: Census of Agriculture Production

descript.abstract: This dataset consists of tables of data derived from the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) Census of Agriculture (CoA) data as compiled by Falcone and LaMotte (2016), for Hydrologic Unit Code 10 (HUC-10) areas. The data consist of 11 tables of production values for various crops and livestock, for example bushels of soybeans per square kilometer or number of cows per square kilometer. The data are for CoA collection years (approximately every 5 years) for the period 1969-2012. Data are provided for soybeans, wheat, corn for grain, corn for silage, rice, cotton, alfalfa-hay, cows, hogs, sheep, and chickens (layers only). Data are derived from national 1-kilometer resolution rasters of county-level tabular data allocated to agricultural land use pixels.
descript.purpose: These data are intended to provide a framework in which watershed-specific studies of water quality in streams and rivers may be analyzed. The focus of the data is on anthropogenic changes over time.
descript.supplinf: Eleven comma-separated text files are given here. Each text file here contains a "uniqid" field, which is the link to the data in all other datasets in this product. Each file has 15,458 rows. HUC-10 boundaries were obtained on January 9, 2018 from the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) National Resources Conservation Service (NRCS) at https://nrcs.app.box.com/v/huc/folder/39640323180 (National Resources Conservation Service, 2017). References: Falcone, J.A., 2015, U.S. conterminous wall-to-wall anthropogenic land use trends (NWALT), 1974–2012: U.S. Geological Survey Data Series 948, 33 p. plus appendixes 3–6 as separate files, http://dx.doi.org/10.3133/ds948. Falcone, J.A., 2016, Mapping enhanced grazing potential based on the NAWQA Wall-to-wall Anthropogenic Land-use Trends (NWALT) product, 1974-2012: U.S. Geological Survey data release, http://dx.doi.org/10.5066/F7CR5RFF. Falcone, J.A., and LaMotte, A.E., 2016, National 1-kilometer rasters of selected Census of Agriculture statistics allocated to land use for the time period 1950 to 2012: U.S. Geological Survey data release, https://doi.org/10.5066/F70R9MHS. LaMotte, A.E., 2015. Selected items from the Census of Agriculture at the county level for the conterminous United States, 1950-2012. U.S. Geological Survey data release, http://dx.doi.org/10.5066/F7H13016. National Resources Conservation Service, 2017, Watershed boundary dataset (WBD): National Resources Conservation Service, U.S. Department of Agriculture, available at https://www.nrcs.usda.gov/wps/portal/nrcs/main/national/technical/nra/geo/, accessed January 9, 2018 from https://nrcs.app.box.com/v/huc/folder/39640323180.

srcinfo.srccontr: HUC-10 boundaries used in data calculations.

citeinfo.origin: James A. Falcone and Andrew E. LaMotte
citeinfo.title: National 1-kilometer rasters of selected Census of Agriculture statistics allocated to land use for the time period 1950 to 2012

srcinfo.srccontr: Gridded county-level source data from which watershed means were derived.

procstep.procdesc: (1) Source rasters were downloaded from Falcone and LaMotte (2016). For this dataset, these were county-level grids of production values for crops and livestock per square kilometer, based on county-level data allocated to land use pixels for the appropriate time period from the NAWQA Wall-to-wall Anthropogenic Landuse Trends (NWALT) dataset (Falcone, 2015; Falcone, 2016). These data had in turn been created from tabular data in LaMotte (2015).
(2) HUC-10 watershed production values were calculated using the zonalmean() command in ArcGIS Grid.

detailed.Name: coa_production_soybeans-huc10.txt, coa_production_wheat-huc10.txt, coa_production_corng-huc10.txt, coa_production_corns-huc10.txt, coa_production_rice-huc10.txt, coa_production_cotton-huc10.txt, coa_production_hayalf-huc10.txt, coa_production_cows-huc10.txt, coa_production_hogs-huc10.txt, coa_production_sheep-huc10.txt, coa_production_chickens-huc10.txt

enttyp.enttypd: Data consist of comma-separated text files. There are 11 tables: coa_production_soybeans-huc10.txt, coa_production_wheat-huc10.txt, coa_production_corng-huc10.txt, coa_production_corns-huc10.txt, coa_production_rice-huc10.txt, coa_production_cotton-huc10.txt, coa_production_hayalf-huc10.txt, coa_production_cows-huc10.txt, coa_production_hogs-huc10.txt, coa_production_sheep-huc10.txt, coa_production_chickens-huc10.txt
enttyp.enttypds: Surface Water Trends project, USGS National Water Quality Program

attr.attrdefs: Unique integer ID used for internal processing and for linking data from other tables for HUC-10 data

attr.attrdef: Bushels of soybeans per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

attr.attrdef: Bushels of wheat (all types) per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

attr.attrdef: Bushels of corn for grain per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

attr.attrdef: Corn for silage or green chop in units of green tons per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

attr.attrdef: Rice in units of hundredweight (100 lbs) per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

attr.attrdef: Cotton in units of bales per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

attr.attrdef: Hay-alfalfa in units of dry tons per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

attr.attrdef: Cows and calves per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012). Includes current inventory of animals plus animals sold in the year.
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

rdom.attrunit: Cows and calves per square kilometer

attr.attrdef: Hogs and pigs per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012). Includes current inventory of animals plus animals sold in the year.
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

rdom.attrunit: Hogs and pigs per square kilometer

attr.attrdef: Sheep per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012). Includes current inventory of animals plus animals sold in the year.
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)

attr.attrdef: Chickens (layers only) per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1969-2012). Includes current inventory of animals plus animals sold in the year.
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture and Falcone and LaMotte (2016)
